text: Used twice. 1st consultation with Dr Bob in Aug24 was all good. Not for my 2nd time with Dr Xing C.Y today. Cannot see him from the video call, don't think it is technical issue, i think he purposely don't show face, can only see grey screen . Arrogant way of talking too. U will feel worse by meeting this kind of doctor especially when u are already not feeling well. Do not wish to post this on Google but there is no way for me to share my review or feedback in app.
A very good customer service from both doctors & helpdesk. Very patient & easy going when resolving technical issue. Would recommend trying it out üëç

My experience w RapiDR is great! Finding a doctor took less than a minute and the help desk was extremely efficient! The doctors are reliable and professional. The prices are low and affordable. Would recommend RapiDR to others who are ill as well!

Great initiative for our medical needs!

My experiences visiting physical clinics have never been great, especially given our system of proving sickness through medical certificates. Sacrificing almost half of my resting time to queue for both a consultation and medication seems very inefficient.
